metadata.title: CVE-2024-36949 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:amd/amdkfd: sync all devices to wait all processes being evicted If thereare more than one device doing reset in parallel, the first device willcall kfd_suspend_all_processes() to evict all processes on all devices,this call takes time to finish. other device will start reset and recoverwithout waiting. if the process has not been evicted before doing recover,it will be restored, then caused page fault.
